title: London - Paris - New York Art Deco caps
content:
might you know a digital equivalent?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [id.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014045423/http:/typophile.com/files/id_1.jpg) | 10.4 KB |

 [‹ (x) Bob Marley & The Wailers album cover type - Capone {Jackie Travison}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014045423/http:/typophile.com/node/31241 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Crown Mills Portland, OR wide shaded engraved serif - LTR Federal {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014045423/http:/typophile.com/node/31236 "Go to next forum topic")
author: el dirto

comments.content:
This sample is **really** degraded. I’m not sure if we can identify it. I’d suggest looking through Mike Y’s [Bauhaus Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014045423/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces1.html), based on that ’A’ and ’Y’ to see if there’s anything there you’d like.

- Lex

thank you lex...  
sorry that was such a bad sample, but it was all i was given. i had found a few similarities with what you pointed me to, and some others i had found on my own, but nothing as close as i need.  
cheers.
